issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
If you try to generate a view via the CLI it will only work on views that are to be generated at the root eg.

`alloy generate view foo`

if you try to generate a view within a subfolder, it fails:

`alloy generate view foo/bar`

The same is not the case with the generating controllers, the following will work:

`alloy generate controller foo/bar`
fields.summary: Alloy CLI can not generate views in a subfolder

comments.body:
This is an error, there was a typ when I first tested it, this is not a bug and the ticket needs to be closed/deleted. 

Sorry guys.

Ket
